desc: Hand-blown glass by Jennifer Nauck and Eben Horton, and home of the Block Island Glass Float Project. We create a variety of functional and sculptural blown glass. The gallery, located in Wakefield, RI, also features works by nationally-recognized glass artists as well as hand-crafted jewelry.

layout.text:
Featuring hand-blown glass by
Eben Horton and Jennifer Nauck
Glass and jewelry by local and national artists
HOME OF THE GLASS FLOAT PROJECT
